content.raw:
Hi, thanks for reporting a possible issue. I don't think there's enough information to tell if this is a bug or a configuration issue.

Would you mind posting this as a question on http://answers.gazebosim.org/questions/ ? When you do, please include a world or model that can be inserted into the world which reproduces the issue.

I'll close this assuming it turns out to be a configuration issue, but I'd be happy to reopen it if it turns out that's not the case.
content.html:
Hi, thanks for reporting a possible issue. I don't think there's enough information to tell if this is a bug or a configuration issue.

Would you mind posting this as a question on http://answers.gazebosim.org/questions/ ? When you do, please include a world or model that can be inserted into the world which reproduces the issue.

I'll close this assuming it turns out to be a configuration issue, but I'd be happy to reopen it if it turns out that's not the case.
